---
name: 'Census: Add your device'
about: Provide photos to include your GB Color in the census.
title: 'gbc-census: Add my device'
labels: [gbc-census, enhancement]
assignees: ace-dent

---

For the census, please state your country and check the following:
- [ ] **Back photo**: Attach a photo clearly showing the serial number (e.g. `CG123456789`) and the production identifier (e.g. `C/CGB-JPN-2`) on the larger rear sticker. üì∑
- [ ] **PCB photo**: Attach photo(s) to show the revision number (e.g. `05`) and PCB panel numbers (e.g. `1-2`), under the battery terminal on the lower left side. This can be seen by opening the battery cover and tilting the unit, but can be tricky to photograph. üîç
- [ ] **Special edition photos** (optional): If your unit is a Special Edition shell, include extra photographs that show the front and any relevant details. ‚ú®
- [ ] **Contributor License Agreement** (CLA): By submitting content to this project, you confirm that you own the material or have the right to share it. You retain ownership, and you grant the project owner (and successors/assignees) a perpetual, worldwide, irrevocable, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, distribute, and create derivative works from your submission for any purpose (including commercial), and to sublicense/relicense it under any terms. You understand your submission may be made public (currently under [CC BY-NC-SA 4.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/)) and you waive any claim to compensation or further control. ‚öñÔ∏è

If you feel comfortable opening the device, photos of the front and rear of the main circuit board are also very helpful! üôè
